moves.title: Front punch
moves.description: Step forward to 12 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform middle right front punch.

moves.title: Middle inner forearm block
moves.description: Turn left 90 degrees to face 9 o'clock. Step back into walking stance. Perform left middle inner forearm block.
moves.korean: gunnun so an palmok kaunde makgi

moves.title: Front punch
moves.description: Step forward to 9 o'clock into walking stance. Perform middle right front punch.

moves.title: Middle inner forearm block
moves.description: Turn left 90 degrees to face 6 o'clock. Step back into walking stance. Perform left middle inner forearm block.
moves.korean: gunnun so an palmok kaunde makgi

moves.title: Front punch
moves.description: Step forward to 6 o'clock into walking stance. Perform middle right front punch.

moves.title: Middle inner forearm block
moves.description: Turn left 90 degrees to face 3 o'clock. Step back into walking stance. Perform left middle inner forearm block.
moves.korean: gunnun so an palmok kaunde makgi

moves.title: Front punch
moves.description: Step forward to 3 o'clock into walking stance. Perform middle right front punch. Kihap.

moves.title: Parallel ready stance
moves.description: Step back to parallel ready stance, facing 12 o'clock.

moves.title: Front punch
moves.description: Step forward to 12 o'clock into walking stance. Perform middle left front punch.

moves.title: Middle inner forearm block
moves.description: Turn right 90 degrees to face 3 o'clock. Step back into walking stance. Perform right middle inner forearm block.
moves.korean: gunnun so an palmok kaunde makgi

moves.title: Front punch
moves.description: Step forward to 3 o'clock into walking stance. Perform middle left front punch.

moves.title: Middle inner forearm block
moves.description: Turn right 90 degrees to face 6 o'clock. Step back into walking stance. Perform right middle inner forearm block.
moves.korean: gunnun so an palmok kaunde makgi

moves.title: Front punch
moves.description: Step forward to 6 o'clock into walking stance. Perform middle left front punch.

moves.title: Middle inner forearm block
moves.description: Turn right 90 degrees to face 9 o'clock. Step back into walking stance. Perform right middle inner forearm block.
moves.korean: gunnun so an palmok kaunde makgi

moves.title: Front punch
moves.description: Step forward to 9 o'clock into walking stance. Perform middle left front punch. Kihap.

moves.title: Parallel ready stance
moves.description: Step back to parallel ready stance, facing 12 o'clock.
